entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:28PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Brief Landspout Tornadoes Possible... At 526 PM MDT, conditions are becoming favorable for the development of landspout tornadoes in and close to the Cheyenne and Kit Carson County area. However, at this time it is unknown which if any storm would produce a landspout. Any tornadoes which develop are expected to pose a limited threat.
